Uses of Class
topquizbackend.Question

  • Packages that use Question 
    Package Description
    topquiz  
    topquizbackend
    This package contains all the Back-End classes/objects for use in the topquiz package.

    • Uses of Question in topquiz

      Constructors in topquiz with parameters of type Question 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestionPanel(Question question, TopQuiz topquiz)
      Constructor for QuestionPanel super that displays the questions' text, submit button and a progress bar that serves as a timer.

    • Uses of Question in topquizbackend

      Subclasses of Question in topquizbackend 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InteractiveQuestion
      The InteractiveQuestion class contains the back-end IA Question data and the methods needed in the back-end for the proper execution of front-end methods.
      class  MultipleChoiceQuestion
      The MultipleChoieQuestion class contains the back-end MC Question data and the methods needed in the back-end for the proper execution of front-end methods.
      class  ShortAnswerQuestion
      The ShortAnswerQuestion class contains the back-end SA Question data and the methods needed in the back-end for the proper execution of front-end methods.
      Methods in topquizbackend that return Question 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Question QuestionBank.popQuestion()
      This method checks whether the QuestionBank has Questions remaining in the bank.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> QuestionBank.getBank() 
      Methods in topquizbackend with parameters of type Question
